entry.title: üéâ Welcome to subscribe to App Store Discounts
entry.summary: Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!
entry.content:
Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!

About our RSS feed

  • Focused on delivering App Store app discount information
  • Whenever an app's price drops or in-app purchases go on sale, we will promptly send you a notification
  • Each app's discount information is presented in a separate feed
  • The RSS feed is completely open-source, allowing you to view, contribute, and add your favorite apps at any time

Find Us

App Store Discounts

Finally

If this project has been helpful to you, would you kindly give us a ‚≠êÔ∏è

entry.title: FILCA - SLR Film Camera
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • UPGRADE PROÔºö‚Ç∫1.499,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫119,99 [‚Ç∫119,99 ~ ‚Ç∫1.499,99]

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫179,99

In-App Purchases

  • UPGRADE PROÔºö‚Ç∫119,99
  • FUJI SERIES FILMÔºö‚Ç∫229,99
  • KODAK SERIES FILMÔºö‚Ç∫249,99
  • WEDDING SERIES FILMÔºö‚Ç∫229,99
  • RETRO SERIES FILMÔºö‚Ç∫229,99
  • IU SERIES FILMÔºö‚Ç∫229,99
  • LOMO SERIESÔºö‚Ç∫229,99
  • UPGRADE PRO VERSIONÔºö‚Ç∫3.499,99

Application Description

Filca is SLR Film Camera 35 film filters and cinematic effects bring your photos to life. @veteranUser "Without Filca, you're just collecting moments with Filca, you're preserving memories." Master your shots with Filca's expert-level manual controls. ‚ñ† Shutter speed, ISO, white balance control in Manual mode ‚ñ† 35mm film filters from industry leaders like Kodak, Fuji, Agfa Filca is designed to optimize your snapshot experience. It's perfect for taking photos of people, self-portraits, night scenes, and capturing the subtle beauty of everyday life. Apply our filters to achieve an authentic analog film appearance. Main Features: * Auto mode camera with 35mm film filter * Manual mode (Exposure and Focus) * Full control over shutter speed, ISO * Various aspect ratios: 4:3, 3:2, 16:9, 1:1 * Digital zoom up to 8x magnification * Manual Focus Control (macro, landscape) * 35mm film filter from Fuji, Kodak, Agfa (including black and white filter) * Film Grain Effect * Film Date Printing Effect * Optical Image Stabilization * Low Power Mode * Selfie Mode * EXIF Data Storage (including location data) * Portrait Enhancements * Full Resolution Photo * Timer and Flash Function * Grid Mode View Pro Features: * White Balance Adjustment Function * Date Print Function Share your photos on Instagram using #filca We look forward to featuring your work. Follow us on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/filca.app/ Terms of Use: https://han.gl/HCCwV Privacy Policy: https://han.gl/Wclkw Let us elevate your photography journey with Filca.

Application Screenshot

iPhone

In-App Purchases

  • Card.Note PremiunÔºö‚Ç∫39,99

Application Description

„ÄåCard.Note„ÄçÔºöÊØè‰∏™ÂøµÂ§¥ÈÉΩÂÄºÂæóÁî®ÂøÉËÆ∞ÂΩï ËøôÊòØ‰∏ÄÊ¨æ‰ª•Âç°Áâá‰∏∫‰∏ªË¶ÅËÆæËÆ°ÁêÜÂøµÁöÑÊûÅÁÆÄËÆ∞‰∫ã App „ÄÇ ‰Ω†ÂÜôÁöÑÊØè‰∏ÄÊÆµÊñáÂ≠óÈÉΩÂèØ‰ª•ÁîüÊàê‰∏ÄÂº†Âº†Á≤æÁæéÁöÑÂç°Áâá „ÄÇ ‰Ω†ÂèØ‰ª•Áî®ÂÆÉÊù•ÂÜôËØó„ÄÅÁü≠Êñá„ÄÅÈöèÊÉ≥Ôºõ ‰πüÂèØ‰ª•Áî®ÂÆÉÊù•ÂÜôÊó•ËÆ∞„ÄÅÊ∏ÖÂçï„ÄÅËßÑÂàí„ÄÅË¶Å‰∫ãÊèêÈÜíÔºõ ËøòÂèØ‰ª•Áõ¥Êé•Áî®ËØ≠Èü≥ËæìÂÖ•Êù•ËÆ∞ÂΩïÊØè‰∏™Áû¨Èó¥ÁöÑÂøµÂ§¥„ÄÇ „ÄåCard.Note„Äç‰πùÂ§ßÁâπÁÇπÔºö 1.ÊûÅÁÆÄËÆæËÆ° Âæ™ÁùÄÊûÅÁÆÄÁöÑËÆæËÆ°ÁêÜÂøµÔºåÁªìÂêàÂõæÊ†áÂèäÊâãÂäøÊìç‰ΩúÔºåËΩªÊùæ‰∏äÊâã„ÄÇ 2.ÂÖ®Â±ÄÂç°ÁâáÂåñ ÂÖÖÂàÜËûçÂÖ•‰∫ÜÂç°ÁâáËÆæËÆ°ÁêÜÂøµÔºåÂèØÊ†πÊçÆÂñúÂ•ΩÈöèÊÑèÂàáÊç¢Ê®™ÁâàÊàñÁ´ñÁâà‰∏§ÁßçÂç°ÁâáÁ¨îËÆ∞ÊòæÁ§∫Ê†∑Âºè„ÄÇ 3.ÂÖ®Â±ÄÊâãÂäøÂåñ ‰∏ãÊãâÂèØÊñ∞Âª∫Á¨îËÆ∞ÔºåÂÜç‰∏ãÊãâÂèØ‰øùÂ≠òÁ¨îËÆ∞ÔºåÂè≥ÊªëÂèØÂëºÂá∫‰ΩúÂìÅÈõÜÔºåÈïøÊåâÂç°ÁâáÂèØÈ¢ÑËßàÂç°ÁâáÂÜÖÂÆπ„ÄÇ 4.ËØ≠Èü≥ÂΩïÂÖ• ÊâìÂºÄ‰æøÂèØÁõ¥Êé•ËØ≠Èü≥ËæìÂÖ•ÔºåÈöèÊó∂ËÆ∞ÂΩïÊØè‰∏™ÁÅµÂÖâÊòæÁé∞ÁöÑÊÉ≥Ê≥ï„ÄÇ‰Ω†ÂèØ‰ª•ÊääÂÆÉÂΩì‰ΩúÊàêiOSÊñáËâ∫Áâà‚ÄúÈó™ÂøµËÉ∂Âõä‚Äù„ÄÇ 5.Ë¶Å‰∫ãÊèêÈÜíÔºö ÂèØËÆæÁΩÆÊèêÈÜíÈóπÁßçÔºåÈáçË¶Å‰∫ãÊÉÖÂíåËÆ°Âàí‰∏çÂÜçÈîôÂ§±„ÄÇ 6.Âø´Êç∑È´òÊïà ÊîØÊåÅ3D-TouchÂèäWidgetÂ∞èÁªÑ‰ª∂ÂäüËÉΩÔºåÂèØÁõ¥Êé•Âú®Â∫îÁî®ÂõæÊ†áÊàñWidgetÂø´ÈÄüÊâìÂºÄÂ∫îÁî®ÊàñÁõ¥Êé•ËøõÂÖ•ÂàõÂª∫Á¨îËÆ∞ÁïåÈù¢ÔºåËÆ©‰Ω†ÈöèÊó∂È´òÊïàÂú∞ËÆ∞ÂΩïÊØè‰∏™ÂøµÂ§¥„ÄÇ 7.ÊñáÈùíÂÆöÂà∂ Á≤æÈÄâ‰∫Ü 10 Ê¨æËÆ∞‰∫ãÂ≠ó‰ΩìÂèä 9 ÁßçÊñáÈùí‰∏ªÈ¢òËâ≤Âç°„ÄÅÂ§öËææ 100 Áßç‰∏çÂêåÈ¢úËâ≤ÁöÑËâ≤Âç°ÔºåÂèØÊ†πÊçÆÂñúÂ•ΩÂÆöÂà∂ÂêÑÁßçÂç°Áâá„ÄÇ 8.iCloud‰∫ëÂêåÊ≠• ÊîØÊåÅiCloud‰∫ëÂêåÊ≠•ÔºåÂ§öÂè∞ËÆæÂ§áÈó¥Êï∞ÊçÆÂèØ‰ªªÊÑèÂêåÊ≠•„ÄÇ 9.Ê∑±Ëâ≤Ê®°Âºè ÂÖ®Â±ÄÈÄÇÈÖçÊ∑±Ëâ≤Ê®°ÂºèÔºåËßÜËßâËàíÈÄÇ‰∏çÂà∫Áúº„ÄÇ ÊÑüË∞¢‰∏ãËΩΩÔºåÁîüÊ¥ªÊÑâÂø´„ÄÇ Â¶ÇÊúâÈóÆÈ¢òÊàñÂª∫ËÆÆÔºåËØ∑ËÅîÁ≥ªÂºÄÂèëËÄÖ ÂæÆÂçöÔºöPoPoemÂºÄÂèëËÄÖ ÈÇÆÁÆ±Ôºöyande18@126.com

entry.title: 8mm Vintage Camera
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • 8mm ProÔºö‚Ç∫1.799,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫119,99 [‚Ç∫119,99 ~ ‚Ç∫1.799,99]

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫179,99

In-App Purchases

  • 8mm ProÔºö‚Ç∫119,99
  • Silent Film ThemeÔºö‚Ç∫0,00
  • Light Leak ThemeÔºö‚Ç∫0,00
  • Countdown ThemeÔºö‚Ç∫0,00

Application Description

8mm is so realistic it was even used to film scenes in the Oscar-winning documentary Searching for Sugar Man! We have established the de facto standard of real-time retro film emulation. It was featured by Apple in App of the Day, App of the Week, In the Director's Chair, App Store Essentials, etc. 8mm Vintage Camera captures the beauty and magic of old-school vintage movies right through your viewfinder. Dust and scratches, retro colors, flickering, light leaks, and even frame shake, all can be instantly added with a single tap of the finger. SHOOT BOTH PHOTOS AND VIDEOS WITH SOPHISTICATED LIVE EFFECTS ‚Ä¢ Combine effects of film color, halation, dust & scratch, film grain, and softening to create authentic old-school movies ‚Ä¢ Adjust the strength of the effects to achieve your own unique visual style ‚Ä¢ 10 Lenses (frame) effects: Projector, Vignetting, Light Leak, Color Fringing, Super 8, Screen, 16mm, Tube, color negatives of Super 8 and 16mm ‚Ä¢ 21 Retro & Aged Films: 1920, Noir, 60s, 70s, Sakura, XPro, Siena, Pela, Indigo, Tuscan, Two-Color, 2-Strip, 3X, and monochromes ‚Ä¢ Additional 21 filters that emulate real historical films and expired films - available with the 8mm Pro subscription ‚Ä¢ Jitter Button to imitate real 8mm projectors frame shakes ‚Ä¢ Sound Switch to add projector sound for extra authenticity or mute the video for a silent movie effect. ‚Ä¢ Up to 4K 30fps with original unfiltered video recording on newer devices A COMPACT EDITOR FOR MOVIE CREATION - Apply film and frame effects to clips - Trim video, pan & zoom photo - Add a soundtrack from your music library - Choose from 5 unique themes with matching titles, transitions 8MM PRO SUBSCRIPTION - You can subscribe or make a one-time purchase for unlimited access to all current filters and future updates - Start your subscription with a free 7-day trial. Once the trial is over, you‚Äôll be charged an annual subscription fee - Your subscription will automatically renew unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. You can go to your Settings > Apple ID > Subscriptions to turn auto-renew off

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.content:
Discount Information

All Price Information

In-App Purchases

  • LifetimeÔºö‚Ç∫800,00
  • AnnualÔºö‚Ç∫299,99
  • MonthlyÔºö‚Ç∫59,99

Application Description

MoneyTrack - Streamlined Personal Finance Tracker Track every penny, master your financial freedom. A pure expense tracking app with no ads, no splash screens, and no investment promotions. ‚ñ† CORE FEATURES ‚Ä¢ Auto-Tracking: Deep integration with Shortcuts allows automatic expense recording triggered by your transactions ‚Ä¢ Comprehensive Entries: Support for income, expenses, reimbursements, transfers, credit card payments, installments, and debt management ‚Ä¢ Insightful Analytics: Visualize spending patterns with pie charts, bar graphs and trend lines to quickly identify financial issues ‚Ä¢ Precise Budgeting: Set annual/monthly budgets for total spending and categories with dynamic daily budget adjustments ‚ñ† COMPLETE ASSET MANAGEMENT ‚Ä¢ Unified management of multiple account types (cash, bank cards, credit cards, store cards) ‚Ä¢ Balance sheet and asset curve for real-time financial status tracking ‚Ä¢ Credit card management system (payment reminders, limit management, interest-free period calculation) ‚Ä¢ Multi-currency asset recording with support for all major currency exchange rates ‚ñ† THOUGHTFUL FUNCTIONS ‚Ä¢ Multiple Ledgers: Flexibly separate different financial records ‚Ä¢ Shared Accounting: Invite family and friends to maintain transparent shared finances ‚Ä¢ Cloud Backup: Free data synchronization across devices with secure protection ‚Ä¢ Flexible Import/Export: Support for importing data from multiple platforms and exporting in Excel format ‚Ä¢ Recurring Entries: Customisable automatic entry tasks that generate transactions on schedule ‚Ä¢ Installment Tracking: Easily monitor payment schedules and receive timely reminders ‚Ä¢ Sub-Categories: Unlimited categorisation options to meet personalised needs ‚ñ† CROSS-PLATFORM EXPERIENCE Synchronise across iPhone, iPad and PC with real-time updates, recording every expenditure wherever you are. ‚ñ† FOCUSED ON FINANCE MANAGEMENT We do one thing only ‚Äî help you better manage your personal finances. No investment promotions, no community distractions, just a pure and efficient expense tracking experience.

Application Screenshot

iPad

Application Description

"Simple but deep! A deck-building roguelike card game!" "Defeat the abyssal boss in a medieval fantasy world!" "Choose a class, collect cards, and build the ultimate deck!" Game Features - Deck-building √ó Roguelike ‚Äì Experience fresh gameplay every time by utilizing different cards! - High score system ‚Äì Break your own records and challenge your limits! - Endless roguelike elements ‚Äì A new adventure awaits with every playthrough! - Various classes to choose from ‚Äì Fight in a style that suits you best! - Single-player game ‚Äì Play at your own pace and take your time!

entry.title: È¨ºË∞∑ÂÖ´Ëçí Tale of Immortal
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • Five BloomsÔºö‚Ç∫179,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫129,99 [‚Ç∫129,99 ~ ‚Ç∫179,99]
  • Ground of No ReturnÔºö‚Ç∫129,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫99,99 [‚Ç∫99,99 ~ ‚Ç∫129,99]

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫299,99

In-App Purchases

  • Five BloomsÔºö‚Ç∫129,99
  • Ground of No ReturnÔºö‚Ç∫99,99

Application Description

Tale of Immortal is an open-world sandbox based on Chinese mythology and cultivation. You will grow to become immortal, conquer the beasts from the Classic of Mountains and Season, make your choices carefully and grasp your own destiny. „ÄêAscend to the Top with Immortal Cultivation A Journey of a Lifetime„Äë Step into the enchanting world of the Tale of Immortal, where cultivation is an art that requires more than just financial means and help from fellow cultivators. To truly master it, one must possess a deep understanding of the craft and have access to the right cultivation venues. But that's not all‚Äîthe journey is fraught with danger, as you'll face unpredictable monsters, crisis-ridden mystic realms, insurmountable barriers, and brilliant treasures waiting to be discovered. „ÄêNPCs with a Life of Their Own AI-Driven Interactive Ecology„Äë Embrace a fully-realized NPC world, where each character is a unique entity with their own friends, family, and life trajectory‚Äî completely independent of your progress. However, if you choose to meddle, you certainly can! „ÄêSurprising Encounters Await Experience a Fascinating Story„Äë Are you ready to embark on a thrilling adventure? One where you might become the hero who saves the day and wins the heart of the love of your life? Or maybe you're looking to stir up some jealousy in your crush and have them fight for your affection? How about fulfilling a fifty-year-old promise or getting caught up in the struggle of a mysterious organization? Perhaps you'll uncover a long-forgotten treasure, only to have it snatched away by a cunning adversary? „ÄêFrom Conquering the Territories to Uniting the World Building the Strongest Sect„Äë Do you want to take your sect to new heights of power and glory? We've got the ultimate sect management gameplay that lets you experience the full range of sect life: from humble disciple to mighty sect master. Join a massive sect and work your way up from the bottom, or take on the challenge of leading a fallen sect back to prominence. „ÄêMartial Arts, Monsters, and Immortals Building Your Unique School„Äë To embark on an epic adventure, you need to hone your skills and become a true warrior. Start by building a solid foundation of cultivation. Your mind skills are crucial to success, so focus on cultivating a powerful mindset. From there, you can delve into martial and spiritual skills to take your abilities to the next level. As you explore, keep an eye out for opportunities to create edges with your motion and special skills. And don't forget to tap into your ultimate skills to save the day when necessary. „ÄêThe Triad of Power Artifact, Alchemy, and Talismans„Äë Sharpen your skills and harness the power of tools! At the start, you get to choose from three formidable weapons, each offering a distinct cultivation system. The Bagua Jade grants you the ability to revive yourself and your chosen ally, the Eye of Providence allows you to steal Beast Skills and gain unparalleled insights into the world, and the Mythical Gourd empowers you to capture a Boss and enlist it as your loyal sidekick: command it to fight by your side or to search for treasure on your behalf.
